wikipedia_page.main: James Clough (30 August 1918 – 2 September 1998) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger. He made a total of 163 appearances in the Football League for Southport, Crystal Palace, Southend United and Barrow, scoring 32 goals. He also played non-league football for Blyth Spartans.Clough died in 1998 at the age of 80.
